topics.body:

I wish I knew what my Ancestry was.

I need to ask my mom about my Great Grandma.

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54171f2a6368723977b30100#post_54171f2a6368723977b30100
That's something I wonder about too sometimes. I know I'm at least one quarter English (because my grandmother is a full-blooded Englishwoman), but as for everything else, I have no idea. But honestly, I don't really think it's all that important.

Im dutch on my father's side
I dont know my mothers
Honestly for some reason I've never been curious to ask
Or ask about my ancestry
Probably because no one else brings it up either

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541721eb6368721234e60100#post_541721eb6368721234e60100
Kilts are from Scotland, ya bloody heathen.

But really, _don't_ mix up Ireland and Scotland. Irish and Scottish people *hate* that.

I'm out of it today I swear. I'm tired, a little Grumpy, Sick, and bloody bored. 

I need some tea.

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541721eb6368721234e60100#post_541721eb6368721234e60100
We have loads of old stuff just stored away. Some old dentist's equipment, some old photograph (some of which "have nazis in them":http://i1361.photobucket.com/albums/r665/ScheisseMies/wanha001_zps2a218a2a.jpg) and some old books, including a bible from the 1800's.

topics.body:
Man im bored
At work on break right now
But during today I got nothing to do
Like I make the guys a bucket of cement
But there are only two guys today and we are trying to make the work last
So it took two hours to go through the first bucket
